Public NotInheritable Class TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider Inherits TripleDES
public ref class TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::TripleDES

summary.span: 定义访问 算法的加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 版本的包装对象。

span.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) version of the algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此算法支持从128位到192位的密钥长度（以64位为增量）。This algorithm supports key lengths from 128 bits to 192 bits in increments of 64 bits. > [!NOTE] > 提供了一种较新的对称加密算法高级加密标准（AES）。A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available. 请考虑使用 类，而不是 类。Consider using the class instead of the class. 使用 仅适用于与旧版应用程序和数据的兼容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，并使用它对文件中的数据进行加密和解密。The following code example creates a object and uses it to encrypt and decrypt data in a file. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File/CPP/fileexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File/CS/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File/VB/fileexample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，并使用它对内存中的数据进行加密和解密。The following code example creates a object and uses it to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory/CPP/memoryexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory/CS/memoryexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory/VB/memoryexample.vb#1)]

span.span: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用于对称算法的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.

para.span: 注意：初始化向量必须长 8 字节。

span.span: Note: The initialization vector must be 8 bytes long.

para.span: 如果它的长度大于 8 字节，则会截断它，而不会引发异常。

span.span: If it is longer than 8 bytes, it is truncated and an exception is not thrown.

para.span: 调用 之前，请检查初始化向量的长度，如果此向量长度太长，则将引发异常。

span.span: Before you call , check the length of the initialization vector and throw an exception if it is too long.

summary.span: 用指定的密钥 () 和初始化向量 () 创建对称的 加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric encryptor object with the specified key () and initialization vector ().
A symmetric encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用具有相同参数的 重载来解密此方法的结果。Use the overload with the same parameters to decrypt the result of this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，并使用它对文件中的数据进行加密和解密。The following code example creates a object and uses it to encrypt and decrypt data in a file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定，则使用此方法生成随机密钥。Use this method to generate a random key when none is specified. 此方法从不返回弱密钥（请参阅 ）。This method will never return a weak key (see ). 此算法支持从128位到192位的密钥长度（以64位为增量）。This algorithm supports key lengths from 128 bits to 192 bits in increments of 64 bits.
